text: Tu milost', kotoruyu Allakh daruyet lyudyam - dozhd', blagodenstviye, bezopasnost' i mudrost', - nikto ne mozhet uderzhivat', a tu milost', kotoruyu Allakh uderzhivayet, nikto ne mozhet im dat'. Poistine, Allakh Mogushchestvennyy Pobeditel', i nikto ne mozhet Yego pobedit' ! On - Mudryy, kotoryy ne dopuskayet oshibok
